PageTitle: Work together according to your goals in custom rooms
PageDescription: Edit and collaborate your way in ONLYOFFICE DocSpace. Fine-tune room access with flexible permissions
WorkTogetherAccording: Work together according to your goals in <0>custom rooms</0>
EditAndCollaborate: Edit and collaborate your way in ONLYOFFICE DocSpace
TailoredDesc: Apply your own settings to use a room for any custom purpose: share content for viewing only, request document editing or reviewing, ask for comments from collaborators or form-filling.
SophisticatedDesc: Fine-tune room access with a wide range of flexible permissions
WatchAVideoToLearnMore: Watch a video to learn more
CostEfectiveForAnyBudgetDesc: Pay for admins only and add any number of regular users and guests for free. Benefit from a free Startup plan for small teams. ONLYOFFICE DocSpace is suitable for all businesses, no matter if it's SMB or a big enterprise. Want to get full control over your corporate data? Deploy DocSpace on your private server.
